content: {"locationId": "3053", "organizationId": "2642", "name": "St. Mary's Church", "address1": "305 E. 11th St", "address2": "", "city": "Anderson", "state": "IN", "zipCode": "46016", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "40.1050234", "longitude": "-85.6753324", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "Our pantry is small and stocked by donations, so we do not need any form of identification. We often have a Spanish speaker available.  We do not have an indoor place to wait , so come prepared for the weather! We are located at the corner of E 11th St. and Fletcher St. Our parking lot entrance is on Fletcher. For the pantry, come in and park, and ring the bell at door #6.The pantry is available once a month.   Two Mondays a month we have a drive-thru food distribution and  the pantry is not open . You can come to the drive-thru whenever we have them. For Drive-Thru Mondays, the distribution is from 2:30-3:30.    Do not come before 2:30, you will not be able to enter!    There is nowhere to park or line-up, and children may be on the Holy Cross School playground. If you do not have children at the school, the best time to come is 3:00. You do not need identification or proof of address.   Drive-Thru Mondays 2025:   February 3 & 17        March 10 & 31        April 14 & 28           May 12          June 2 & 16            July 7 & 21   For the safety of our students and staff, we can no longer allow  any dogs , regardless of size, leashed or not, on the grounds of Holy Cross School, which includes our Food Pantry and Second Harvest drive-thru. This also applies to  dogs in vehicles . We will not be able to serve anyone with a dog present unless it is a  service animal trained to do work or   perform a task for an individual with a disability . Unfortunately, we can not make exceptions. We are sorry for any inconvenience.", "notes": "For the safety of our students and staff, we can no longer allow  any dogs , regardless of size, leashed or not, on the grounds of Holy Cross School, which includes our Food Pantry and Second Harvest drive-thru.
